articles.title: Broadway ditching mask mandate starting July 1 - Fox Business
articles.description: Though the curtain is closing on Broadway's mask mandate, audience members will still be given the option and are encouraged to keep wearing them.
articles.content:
New York City's 41 Broadway theaters will ditch their mask mandate starting July 1.

articles.author: Leyla Mohammed
articles.title: Hailey Bieber Is Being Sued For Trademark Infringement After Launching Her Skincare Line Rhode By A Minority Co-Owned Business With The Same Name - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: “Hailey could choose any brand for her skin-care line. We have only the brand name ‘RHODE’ that we’ve built. That’s why we didn’t sell her our brand when she asked four years ago, and why we ask her now to change her skin-care line’s brand.”
